record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1911. Fifth row: N. B. Johnson (trainer), M. F. Carpenter, A. A. Stagg (coach), H. O. Gifford, and J. E. Raycroft; fourth row: W. H. Kuh, I. N. Davenport, S. E. Earle, and H. E. Goettler; third row: J. A. Menaul, R. B. Rogers (captain), and L. H. Whiting; second row: W. S. Timblin, F. J. Coyle, G. E. Kuh, and E. R. Long; first row: A. H. Straube and G. S. Skinner.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
